Articles.Content:
Greetings, I have been looking around on the internet for things to do in KSP, and thanks to the KSP Wiki, I have just gotten some ideas that I will use in my personal custom campaign to make the game more fun to me and see if I can improve my skills, and yes I honestly created this account just to post the results of this.

Now some of this stuff is from the KSP Wiki under the name Campaigns - Kerbal Space Program, well most of the stuff, here is a link if you're in to that sort of thing:http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Campaigns

I will also have some real life scales and a scaling from one of my favorite games, so lets see what we got into hand, oh and also a link a Data Log I have will be putted up in dropbox at a later date but it will only be as updated as the time I uploaded this topic, but this topic was meant to be a small history line showing what I have done during this, I just wanted to do this out of fun, if I seem to have broken anything under any law on the forums I will edit this topic, anyways lets see if I survive or not.

Data (so far):

Kardashev Scale: Type I (1)

Mircodimensional Mastery Scale: Type III -minus (3)

Technological Achievement Tier: Tier 4, Space Age

 

Total Missions and/or campaigns: 25, 4 Custom made

Diffculty Scale:

See Link to WIki

Missions and Campaigns:

See Link to Wiki

 

Missions and Campaigns completed:

None

 

Custom Made:

Tier 3, the best of the best (Take over the whole galaxy using Kerbal Galaxy 2)

World Superpower (Create a strong military with BDArmory, BDFPS, and mods like this above and on Kerbin.)

Hostile Contacts (Create a small Insurrection with BDArmory and destroy it.)

The First Citizen in Space (Allow Citizens from Kerbin to be apart of the project, still deciding which mod to use for this one.)

The End of the Project (This is it, complete all Missions and Campaigns, and move to another galaxy to start the project all over again (reset))

 

Mod list:Coming soon

 

 

(NOTE:If possible, I might edit this topic to add on and remove some stuff.)

 

Feel free to suggest me missions to do for this project, I wanna test my skills.

 

 

 

Edited March 6, 2016 by Lieutenant David
Forgot some stuff, oops..
